      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_99626</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Planets that have been known for a very long time</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Planeten, die während einer sehr langen Zeit 
bekannt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Planètes qui ont été connues pendant un temps 
très long</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Planetas que foram sabidos por um tempo muito 
longo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Pianeti che sono stati conosciuti per un tempo 
molto molto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πλανήτες που ήταν γνωστοί για έναν πολύ μακροχρόνιο 
χρόνο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Planetas que se han sabido por un tiempo muy 
largo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the five planets that have been known already for thousands of years either because they are very near the Earth (Mercury, Venus and Mars) or are very large (Jupiter and Saturn).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Jupiter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mars</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mercury</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Neptune</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Pluto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Saturn</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solar system</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Uranus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Venus</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die fünf Planeten, die 
bereits für Tausenden Jahre irgendein bekannt, weil sie sehr nahe der
Masse (Quecksilber, Venus und Mars) sind oder sehr groß sind (Jupiter
und Saturn).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les cinq planètes qui 
ont été déjà connues pour des milliers d'années l'un ou l'autre 
parce qu'elles sont très près de la terre (mercure, Venus et Mars) 
ou sont très grandes (Jupiter et Saturne).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os cinco planetas que 
têm sido sabidos já para milhares dos anos qualquer um porque são 
muito perto da terra (mercúrio, Venus e Marte) ou são muito grandes 
(Jupiter e Saturno).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i cinque pianeti che 
sono stati conosciuti già per le migliaia di anni uno perché sono 
molto vicino alla terra (mercurio, Venus e Marte) o sono molto grandi 
(Jupiter e Saturno).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει πέντε πλανήτες που ήταν 
γνωστοί ήδη για χιλιάδες έτη είτε επειδή αυτοί είναι πολύ 
κοντά στη γη (υδράργυρος, Αφροδίτη και Αρης) είτε είναι πολύ 
μεγάλοι (Δίας και Κρόνος).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra los cinco planetas que 
se han sabido ya para los millares de años cualquiera porque son muy 
cerca de la tierra (mercurio, Venus y Marte) o son muy grandes 
(Júpiter y Saturno).</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mars</string>
          </keyword>
